sentences.english: The right style of swimsuit can help by hiding bulges .
sentences.chinese: 款式适当的游泳衣有助于掩饰肥胖部位。

sentences.english: Mary likes swimming in bikini suit.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽喜欢穿三点式游泳衣游泳。

sentences.english: Papa sits on the small seat.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸买了一件小的游泳衣。

sentences.english: In contrast, my sister wanted this amazing bathing suit for $100.
sentences.chinese: 相反，我姐姐想要一件价值100美元的游泳衣。

sentences.english: Once you have swum in the nude you don't want to swim clothed again.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你尝试过裸泳，你就不会再想穿游泳衣了。

sentences.english: A fur coat is incongruous with a bathing suit.
sentences.chinese: 皮大衣和游泳衣配在一起很不相称。

sentences.english: How do you like me new bathing suit?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢我的新游泳衣吗？

sentences.english: Do you have your swimsuit with you?
sentences.chinese: 你的游泳衣有没有带在身边？

sentences.english: Bathing suit of course is indispensable.
sentences.chinese: 游泳衣当然是必不可少。

sentences.english: He rinsed out the sea water from his bathing suit.
sentences.chinese: 他把游泳衣上的海水漂洗掉。

sentences.english: When summer rolls around, out come the swimming jacket and circle.
sentences.chinese: 当夏天来临后，游泳衣和游泳圈就出来了。

sentences.english: We were so excited and changed my clothes into swimming gear and wore sunscreen.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常激动，都换上了自己的游泳衣和擦了防晒品。

sentences.english: He wore his swimsuit underneath his slacks.
sentences.chinese: 他在运动服里面衬着游泳衣。

sentences.english: Remember to wring your swimsuit out after your swim.
sentences.chinese: 游完泳后记住把游泳衣拧干。

sentences.english: I need to take my bathing suit.
Buy new bathing suits and fly to a tropical destination.
sentences.chinese: 买些游泳衣，去一个热带地方。

definition: swim ring/swim tube/(fig.) (coll.) spare tire (roll of fat around the waist)
